scripts.build: npm run clean-build && npm run build-repos
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p dist && cat src/css/*.css >> dist/streamhub-input.min.css && cp -r src/css/fonts dist/fonts
scripts.link: rm -rf lib/streamhub-permalink && ln -s ~/Documents/personal/dev/streamhub-permalink/ lib/streamhub-permalink && rm -rf lib/streamhub-sdk && ln -s ~/dev/streamhub-sdk/ lib/streamhub-sdk && rm -rf lib/streamhub-share && ln -s ~/Documents/personal/dev/streamhub-share/ lib/streamhub-share && rm -rf lib/streamhub-ui && ln -s ~/Documents/personal/dev/streamhub-ui/ lib/streamhub-ui
scripts.build-repos: npm run build-permalink && npm run build-sdk && npm run build-share && npm run build-ui && npm run build-wall && npm run copy-dists
scripts.copy-dists: cp -a lib/streamhub-sdk/dist/ dist/ && cp -a lib/streamhub-ui/dist/ dist/ && cp -a lib/streamhub-share/dist/ dist/ && cp -a lib/streamhub-permalink/dist/ dist/ && cp -a lib/streamhub-wall/dist/ dist/
